did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: A Guide to the Executive Letter Books of the Virginia Office of the Governor, 1780-1906

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Executive Letter Books of the Virginia Office of the Governor, [cite specific date and Governor used]. Accession 35358, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Executive letter books, 1780-1906, are comprised of copies of outgoing letters of Virginia Governors. Most volumes are indexed by recipient name.
Letter book, 1780 July-Sept 13, (Thomas Jefferson) is available as a negative photostat and a typewritten transcription. Original is at the British Museum. (Accession 13868).
Letter book, 1781 Aug 22 - Nov 29 (Thomas Nelson; David Jameson) also includes a handwritten transcript of the original.
